item.title: Not Giving Laken Riley’s Killer The Death Penalty Is A Miscarriage Of Justice
item.description: Ibarra should have received the death penalty as a matter of principle for a nation that values the lives of its citizens.

item.title: CBS’ Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Election Year
item.description: CBS gave Americans good reason to stop believing corporate media was the appropriate medium for facilitating U.S. elections.

item.title: Here’s How The Media Are Lying Right Now: NYT’s ‘Heartbroken’ Black Women Edition
item.description: The New York Times interviewed a handful of DEI scammers and looked at TikTok to continue dividing people with race and sex.
